issue.title: Get Github activity mirrored to JIRA
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12?focusedCommentId=15178882) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Per INFRA-11370 this may be a little bit of configuration, and we should decide if we all of the GitHub traffic mirrored to dev@arrow versus another distro list where signal-to-noise ratio may be less important

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12?focusedCommentId=15410181) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
If we plan to have all comments on github and commits sent to a list I'd suggest to setup one separate from dev@arrow for that reason. commits@arrow possibly?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12?focusedCommentId=15410775) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I agree; I think the e-mail traffic, particularly 1 e-mail per comment on PRs, would be excessive.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12?focusedCommentId=16004869) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I created INFRA-14131

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12?focusedCommentId=16004870) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Are there examples of connecting GitHub to JIRA? We can also stick with our current process of posting the PR link as a comment

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12?focusedCommentId=16005058) by Jacques Nadeau (jnadeau):*
I'm pretty sure that Drill has a system when a PR starts with a JIRA number, any comments to the PR are copied back.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12?focusedCommentId=16005059) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
`[~wesmckinn]` Drill has done this

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12?focusedCommentId=16006333) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Since I'm not an officer or ASF member I'm not able to request creation of reviews@arrow.apache.org

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12?focusedCommentId=16006645) by Julien Le Dem (julienledem):*
`[~wesmckinn]` I have submitted the request and commented in INFRA-14131

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12?focusedCommentId=16169450) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This is done. Turns out to get this fully working we needed to add ASF Github Bot to the Contributor role in JIRA
